entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:45 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronation 9:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -29.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -32.4°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
